org.mobicents.slee.container.resource
Interface SleeEndpoint

All Superinterfaces:
javax.slee.resource.SleeEndpoint
public interface SleeEndpoint
extends javax.slee.resource.SleeEndpoint

An extension to SleeEndpoint that provides custom functionality.

Author:
martins
